about:
I am a dedicated software developer working at an ISP. I specialize in technologies like Spring/Java and NodeJS for backend development, and JavaScript with React for frontend projects. In my work, I frequently use databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB to persist data in private projects. Additionally, I am skilled in network monitoring, managing networks with thousands of clients using tools like Grafana, Zabbix, and GineACS.

Outside of work, I have diverse interests and hobbies. I enjoy playing soccer, chess, and learning video editing and marketing. I am also learning French to broaden my language skills.

I am Brazilian by nationality and also a volunteer web developer for the Hepatology Awareness Project. In this role, I contribute to projects focusing on disseminating information about symptoms, directing individuals to hospitals for diagnosis, and providing resources for accessing free medication.
